title: Fire pit, Spacious walk-in and walk through closets*
posting_body: This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1400 Sq.
Located in the heart of downtown Redmond, the Heron provides you with optimal location and a modern living environment for your lifestyle.
Take your pick from 95 contemporary apartment homes ranging from studios to three-bedrooms, including loft layouts.

100% hard surfaced laminates and concrete in living areas*, Stainless steel Whirlpool appliances, Air Conditioning*, Schlage Keyless Entry to Homes, Concrete custom built beautiful quartz top kitchen islands*, Kitchen pantries*, Tiled showers, Open shelving above sink, Towel niches, Up to 14' ceilings*, Dual flush toilets, U-shape kitchens*, Under-mount sinks, Decks and balconies*, Spacious walk-in and walk through closets*, Full size washer and dryer, Commercial grade carpet tiles in bedrooms, Quartz countertops, Customizable Thermostats, Unique sliding barn-doors*, 3 cm Quartz countertops, Tech area
Grills, Outdoor Dining and Seating area, Media Lounge, Fitness Center, Shuffleboard, Bike Workshop, Fire pit, Tranquil and lush courtyard, Complimentary Scanomat TopBrewer system
